title: WATCH: These are the top 10 easiest music instruments to learn how to play
text:
WATCH: These are the top 10 easiest music instruments to learn how to play

Cape Town – Ever wanted to call yourself a musician but didn't know what instrument to start with?

Well then, Ms Mojo's list of top ten musical instruments to play is perfect for you.

From harmonica, maracas, bongos and xylophone to the ukulele, kazoo, recorder and triangle, it doesn't take a whole lot to get started on these instruments.

With that in mind, it's important to remember that as easy as it is to start, it might be harder to master.

Compiled by Alex Isaacs. (Photo: Hannah Busing on Unsplash)
description: These instruments make it even easier to call yourself a musician!
